name: Maze
tagline: A perfect maze, by definition, is path-connected and loop free.  It is equivalent to a spanning tree on a graph in which nodes are blocks in a grid and edges are up/down/left/right adjacencies. Anyway, I drew one with OpenGL/GLUT for Computer Graphics class.
body: Click [here](https://youtu.be/Kv8SRv4HH1g) to see the maze solver in action.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
